attributes.action: Force All Universities to Give Students Free and Completely Unlimited Access to the Internet Through All Channels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The internet gives university students access to the largest library of information in history. This petition is to ask the PM to instruct every university in the UK to give it's students full and completely unlimited access to the internet through all channels by law including university librarys, in rooms on campus, wifi or by any other means. Limiting access to this information in it's various different forms; video & audio being easy ways to consume information; goes completely against the interests of students who want to learn while they are at university and shouldn't be limited in doing so.
